title: Wo Shi Jiang Xiaobai
alternative_title: I'm Joybo, Wo Shi Jiang Xiao Bai, 我是江小白
description: Jiang Xiaobai starts his first ever job as an editor. His new work partner, writer Tong Li, however, continually gives him a hard time. Then one day, he learns that Tong Li is a long-lost friend from his childhood. Gradually, their past is revealed.
